If $\varphi_1 = f$ a.e., then we are done, otherwise $\int (f - \varphi_1) \mathrm{d}\mu > 0$ and hence there is $\varphi_2 \in \mathcal{F}$ such that $\varphi_2 \le f - \varphi_1$ , or $\varphi_1 + \varphi_2 \le f$ and $∫φ_2 \ dμ > 0$ .
